description: Casts a vote for a specified ProposalId on behalf of a member. The member to vote as, specified by VoterMemberId, must be in the same Amazon Web Services account as the principal that calls the action. Applies only to Hyperledger Fabric.

parameters.name: NetworkId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the network.

parameters.name: ProposalId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the proposal.

parameters.name: VoterMemberId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the member casting the vote.
